title: Amazon launches Alexa-enabled smart clock. Here’s all you need to know about Eco Spot - The Economic Times
summary:
Amazon Launches Alexa-Enabled Echo Spot – Everything You Need to Know

Publication Date: Today
Source: Amazon News

Amazon has unveiled its latest product, the Echo Spot, which integrates features of the Alexa smart home product line. It is designed to offer users customizable aesthetics and a rich audio experience.

  • 2.83-inch customizable touchscreen display with vibrant color themes and clock faces.
  • 1.73-inch front-firing speaker for immersive audio experience.
  • Seamless integration with smart home devices and Alexa Routines for automation.
  • Priced at Rs 8,999, with a special introductory price of Rs 6,449.
“Create a morning routine that gradually brightens your smart lights and plays soft music to wake you up—all with a single voice command.”

In conclusion, the Echo Spot provides an innovative solution for integrating smart home technology with daily routines, enhancing the user's experience through customization and ease of use.
newTitle: Amazon Launches Alexa-Enabled Echo Spot – Everything You Need to Know

title: Amazon launches new Echo Spot with customisable compact display: Details - Business Standard
summary:
Amazon Launches New Echo Spot with Customisable Compact Display

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Tech News

The new Amazon Echo Spot is a compact and customisable smart alarm clock, designed to enhance user experience with its Alexa integration.

  • The Echo Spot features a 2.83-inch touch screen display with eight custom clock faces and multiple colour schemes.
  • Currently priced at Rs 8,999, with an introductory price of Rs 6,449 for a limited period.
  • Offers features such as custom alarms, snooze functionality, and a selection of new alarm sounds.
  • Functions as an audio device with a 1.73-inch speaker for music, podcasts, and audiobooks.
  • Can serve as a hub for compatible smart home devices and includes Ultrasound Motion Detection for automation.
“Alexa on the new Echo Spot enables other functions such as weather and temperature, displayed with illustrations.”

In conclusion, the Echo Spot combines convenience and technology, targeting users looking for a versatile alarm clock and smart home device.
newTitle: Amazon Launches New Echo Spot with Customisable Compact Display

title: OnePlus launches 180 days phone replacement plan, available for OnePlus 13 - India Today
summary:
OnePlus Launches 180-Day Phone Replacement Plan for OnePlus 13 and 13R

Published On: Jan 8, 2025 | Source: India Today

OnePlus has announced a new phone replacement plan exclusively for its flagship OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R smartphones, applicable to purchases made before February 13, 2025.

  • The free replacement offer is valid within the first 180 days of purchase for hardware issues.
  • Customers must visit an authorized service center to confirm eligibility for a replacement device.
  • After the free period, users can opt for a paid protection plan at differing prices: Rs 2,599 for OnePlus 13 and Rs 2,299 for OnePlus 13R.
  • The OnePlus 13 is priced at Rs 69,999 and the OnePlus 13R at Rs 42,999, both available with bank discounts.
“We are proud to introduce this protection plan, further enhancing the user experience,” said Robin Liu, CEO of OnePlus India.

This new plan aims to provide better service and reliability for customers, reflecting OnePlus's confidence in their products.
newTitle: OnePlus Launches 180-Day Phone Replacement Plan for OnePlus 13 and 13R

title: Jio's 5.5G arrives in India, offering 1 Gbps speed on OnePlus 13 Series smartphones - India TV News
summary:
Jio's 5.5G arrives in India, offering 1 Gbps speed on OnePlus 13 Series smartphones

Date: [Insert publication date here] Source: [Insert source here]

OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 13 Series in India, featuring advanced AI capabilities and the first smartphones to support Jio's 5.5G technology.

  • The OnePlus 13 Series includes OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R models.
  • 5.5G technology allows devices to connect to multiple network cells simultaneously.
  • Impressive downlink speeds of 1,014.86 Mbps achieved on Jio's 5.5G network.
  • 5.5G is a step up from traditional 5G, promising better speeds, lower latency, and improved reliability.
"The cutting-edge 5.5G technology enables faster connectivity and improved overall performance." - James Paterson, Senior Global PR Manager at OnePlus

This launch marks a significant step in India's technological advancements, enhancing connectivity and user experience.
newTitle: Jio's 5.5G Launch in India with OnePlus 13 Series Smartphones

title: [CES 2025] Home of the Future: Samsung Redefines the Standard for Smart Homes - samsung.com
Amazon launches Alexa-enabled Echo Spot in India for Rs 8,999 - India Today
summary:
Amazon launches Alexa-enabled Echo Spot in India for Rs 8,999

Published On: Jan 8, 2025 | Published By: Divya Bhati

Amazon has introduced the Echo Spot in India, a compact, Alexa-enabled smart alarm clock priced at Rs 8,999. The device offers smart home integration, custom alarms, and media playback.

Key Features:

  • Compact design with a 2.83-inch touchscreen display.
  • Custom alarms with music options.
  • Smart home integration and control through Alexa.
  • Audio calls, household announcements, and privacy controls.
  • Available in Black and Blue.
“Customers can gently wake up to their favorite music, control Alexa-compatible smart lights and home appliances, and glance at the weather and their calendar–by giving voice commands to Alexa from the comfort of their bed.” - Parag Gupta, Director and Country Manager, Amazon Devices India

As part of an introductory offer, the Echo Spot will be available at a discounted price of Rs 6,449 for a limited period. This device enhances the bedside clock experience by allowing users to control smart appliances and more.
newTitle: Amazon launches Alexa-enabled Echo Spot in India for Rs 8,999

title: CES 2025: Panasonic's new flagship OLED TV has Amazon Fire TV built-in - Business Standard
summary:

Date: January 2025 | Source: Business Standard

The Panasonic Z95B Series OLED TV, launched at CES 2025, integrates Amazon Fire TV, Apple AirPlay, and advanced display technology for an enhanced viewing experience.

  • Available in 55-inch, 65-inch, and 77-inch sizes
  • Features Primary RGB Tandem display for brighter visuals
  • Powered by HCX Pro AI Processor MK II with 4K Remaster Engine
  • Supports Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos
  • Integrates live streaming with Amazon Fire TV for content discovery

“The Z95B series introduces Calman and ISFccc calibration, delivering professional-grade tools to fine-tune colour accuracy and display performance.”

title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked: Pre-reserve open for Galaxy S25 series in India - Business Standard
summary:
Samsung Galaxy Unpacked: Pre-reserve open for Galaxy S25 series in India

Publication Date: January 2024 | Source: Samsung News

Samsung has launched a pre-reserve program for its Galaxy S25 series, allowing customers in India to secure early access and get special benefits worth up to Rs 5,000.

  • Customers can pay a token amount of Rs 1,999 to pre-reserve any model of the Galaxy S25 series.
  • The Galaxy S25 series is set to be unveiled at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22.
  • Benefits include an e-voucher worth Rs 5,000 redeemable on Samsung’s platforms.
  • Pre-reserving customers will receive early access to the new devices, including exclusive color options.
  • The token amount will be adjusted against the final purchase price of the device.
“Customers who pre-reserve will be among the first to receive the new devices after launch.”

This initiative is aimed at enhancing customer engagement and ensuring early adopters of the Galaxy S25 series enjoy exclusive benefits and early product access.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S25 Pre-reserve Program Launches in India

title: Where is the One UI 7 update for the Galaxy S23, S23+ and S23 Ultra? - SamMobile - Samsung news
summary:
Where is the One UI 7 update for the Galaxy S23, S23+ and S23 Ultra?

Publication Date: January 8th, 2025
Source: SamMobile

The Galaxy S23 series, after receiving its first major update, is anticipated to get the One UI 7 update around February 2025, following a quiet update period.

  • The Galaxy S23 series has only received One UI 6.0 and minor updates since launch.
  • Samsung launched a beta program for One UI 7 with only the Galaxy S24 series included.
  • Plans for the beta program for older models have reportedly been scrapped.
  • The S25 series is expected to be the first to receive the stable One UI 7.
  • No official timeline has been provided by Samsung for the rollout of the update.
“Stay tuned for updates on when the One UI 7 rollout begins.”

This update is highly anticipated by Galaxy S23 users who have been waiting for a substantial upgrade.
newTitle: Where is the One UI 7 update for the Galaxy S23, S23+ and S23 Ultra?

title: Dell unveils Apple-like rebrand in bid to make PCs cool again - ETBrandEquity
summary:
Dell unveils Apple-like rebrand in bid to make PCs cool again

Publication Date: January 8, 2025   |   Source: Bloomberg

Dell Technologies Inc. is rebranding its PCs to challenge the stagnation in sales and appeal to modern consumers by simplifying product names akin to Apple.

  • Dell is dropping older product names like “XPS” and “Inspiron”.
  • The new naming strategy will include three tiers: Dell, Dell Pro, and Dell Pro Max.
  • Executives acknowledge the similarities to Apple's marketing naming conventions.
  • AI-optimized systems and the end of support for Windows 10 are expected to drive new purchases.
“Customers really prefer names that are easy to remember and easy to pronounce.” - Jeff Clarke, COO of Dell

This strategic shift aims to re-engage consumers and spur PC upgrades amid a decline in sales.
newTitle: Dell Reveals Apple-Inspired Rebranding to Revitalize PC Sales

title: Samsung’s massive 115-inch mini-LED TV is its largest yet – but there’s an even bigger one at CES 2025 - TechRadar
summary:
Samsung’s massive 115-inch mini-LED TV is its largest yet – but there’s an even bigger one at CES 2025

Publication Date: N/A Source: TechRadar

The Samsung QN90F mini-LED, showcasing an impressive 115-inch display, is turning heads at CES 2025. However, it is not the largest mini-LED TV at the event, with the Hisense 116-inch model taking that title.

  • The Samsung QN90F is a successor to the highly regarded QN90D model, known for its performance in sports and gaming.
  • The Hisense 116” model features groundbreaking specs including a new RGB mini-LED backlight design and 10,000 nits brightness.
  • Both TVs emphasize superior viewing experiences with advanced technologies for brightness and glare reduction.
  • Pricing could be a significant factor, with Samsung typically positioned at a higher cost than competitors like Hisense.
With the addition of Glare Free tech to the new model, it should be a fantastic choice for viewing sports in bright rooms.

Choosing between these two impressive mini-LED TVs will be challenging, as ultra-big-screen TV buyers seek the best value and performance features.
newTitle: Samsung’s 115-inch mini-LED TV at CES 2025 and its competition

title: Intel expands Core Ultra AI chips amidst market competition - TechTarget
summary:
Intel Expands Core Ultra AI Chips Amidst Market Competition

Date: January 7, 2025 Source: TechTarget

Intel has expanded its Core Ultra AI chips lineup, targeting gamers and graphic designers as it aims to counter competition from AMD and Qualcomm.

  • Introduction of Core Ultra 200HX and H series chips for mobile PCs.
  • Launch coincided with CES 2025 and follows previous releases for business PCs.
  • Market demand for AI PCs remains subdued; shipment dips reported by IDC.
  • Intel anticipates stronger positioning in the AI market with upcoming product launches.
"Without these new chips, they would have fallen far behind the others in the AI PC category," said Jack Gold, principal analyst at J. Gold Associates.

Intel's new processors are designed to enhance both gaming and enterprise computing capabilities as the company gears up for future competition.
newTitle: Intel Expands Core Ultra AI Chips Amidst Market Competition

title: CES 2025 | AMD's AI PRO chips to power Dell's new commercial laptops - CNBCTV18
summary:
AMD's AI PRO Chips to Power Dell's New Commercial Laptops at CES 2025

Publication Date: CES 2025
Source: CNBC TV18

At CES 2025, AMD announced that its Ryzen AI PRO processors will power Dell’s new Pro laptops, marking the chips' debut in Dell commercial devices. These AI-powered PCs promise enhanced productivity, efficiency, security, and advanced AI features like Copilot+.

  • AMD Ryzen AI PRO processors announced at CES 2025.
  • The first use of these chips in Dell commercial devices.
  • AI PCs are touted to enhance productivity with features like real-time translation and AI image generation.
  • Dell has streamlined its laptop lineup, eliminating older model names.
“We’re incredibly proud to collaborate with Dell on the next generation of commercial PCs powered by AMD Ryzen AI PRO processors,” said Jack Huynh, Senior Vice President and General Manager of AMD’s Computing and Graphics Group.
“AI PCs represent the next frontier in computing, transforming how we work, create, and connect,” said Sam Burd, President of Dell’s Client Solutions Group.

The collaboration highlights a significant step in integrating AI technology into everyday computing, making the devices suitable for today’s advanced business demands.
newTitle: AMD's AI PRO Chips to Power Dell's New Commercial Laptops at CES 2025

The Hyve package security box should protect deliveries from dreaded porch pirates - Engadget
summary:
The Hyve Package Security Box Should Protect Deliveries From Dreaded Porch Pirates

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Engadget

The Hyve is a smart lockbox designed to prevent package theft, aimed at those who frequently receive deliveries in urban areas.

  • The Hyve is touted as the "first branded smart lockbox."
  • It features a carbon fiber tether that is hard to cut, along with an accelerometer and alarm for added security.
  • The accompanying app includes alerts for the owner and their chosen contacts in case of disturbance.
  • The box is weather-proof and includes a photo window for delivery verification.
  • The device can operate for up to 18 months on battery and solar power.
  • Costing $300, it is set to be released for sale in June 2025.
“Hyve Security says that wide adoption of these lockboxes can eventually allow retailers to ship items without so much wasteful packaging.”

The Hyve presents a practical solution to package theft, especially in urban settings, while also aiming to reduce packaging waste in delivery systems.
newTitle: The Hyve Package Security Box Aims to Combat Porch Pirates
